title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2242/91 of 26 July 1991 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3944/87 fixing coefficients for calculating levies on pigmeat products and amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2242/91  of 26 July 1991  amending Regulation (EEC) No 3944/87 fixing coefficients for calculating levies on pigmeat products and amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical  nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 (2), first subparagraph of Regulation (EEC) No 3944/87, the first sentence is deleted.
In the first subparagraph of additional note 2.B in Chapter 2 of Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87, the first sentence is deleted.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 October 1991. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 129, 11. 5. 1989, p. 12. (3) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1987, p. 25. (4) OJ No L 121, 12. 5. 1990, p. 29. (5) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1. (6) OJ No L 107, 27. 4. 1991, p. 10.
